content.detailedDescription: Plase call me. i have a difficult time typing.
content.summary: Please call me "seen cylinder object change shape fly between trees

content.detailedDescription: About 3:45 or 4:00 a.M. on 12/5/2010 i opened the sliding glass door on the north side of our house to let my dogs out to relieve themselves and out of the corner of my right eye i saw a bright white light so i turned to face it and observed what appeared to be a very bright, circular white light above the horizon of the sandia mtns.  in the background of sky there are in fact two bright yellowish lights that are visable every night; both on the crest of the sandias and apart from one another and this light was "centered" and above them and the sight of it appeared to be a triangle with the yellow lights of sandia crest on the left and the light of the sandia peak tram house on the right forming the "base" of the triangle along the sandia crest and the bright light forming the peak of the triangle at the top.  i started to dismiss my initial sighting of the light as the moment when an aircraft turned on it's landing lights and i must have seen it as it was moving towards me.... so i waited to see if it would turn toward the south to albuquerque international or westward to double eagle. it seemed peculiar to me that it was taking entirely too long for any "aircraft" to reach me; the night was perfectly quiet, there was no jet engine noise or prop noise, there were no strobe lights or red and green wingtip lights, no automobile noises to muffle the sounds that should have been there. i looked closely at the white light and observed that it seemed to flicker somewhat along the edges and "wobble" side to side and up and down, but it certainly was not getting any closer to my location... it was just up in the sky shining brightly... hovering as it were and then as i watched the light it went out! it just vanished completely from my sight! the night was still perfectly quiet and there were no sounds, and there were no strobes or red and green wingtip lights that i could observe, and no competing automobile noises as i listened for some jet engine noise or propellers beating the air like a helicopter or airplane would.  there was no sound. i was stumped.  i didn't know what i had seen and i certainly couldn't identify it either. as my dogs were coming back in i couldn't help looking toward the sandia mountains for one final look and just as suddenly as it had disappeared, it reappeared in the very same area it was before!!  wow!! it was there, i didn't imagine it. where had it gone and where did it come from?  it was now clear to me that there was a very real, very curious event indeed going on  and i was a witness to it.  i observed the same behavior as before but then as i watched the light rotated from pointing straight toward me to my left and faced to the north.  it remained there and looked like a cone. a cone of white light with the smaller end facing south and the wider end facing north. i am not sure how long it remained this way, it got dimmer and bright again and again and as i was observing the "cone" of bright light the entire cone rotated back to it's left and faced westward again.  it continued to brighten and dim somewhat for several minutes i started to thik it was similiar to the lights over phoenix, but only one light here, and then, as i watched, it just went off like someone flipped a switch; and as i looked at the place where the incredibly bright white light used to be, there was now what appeared to be a glowing "ember" that was colored yellow and grew steadily smaller and smaller until it finally disappeared completely and i saw it no more.
content.summary: While letting my dogs outside through my patio door, i observed a brilliant white light that appeared to be above the ne heights of albuquerque

content.detailedDescription: This happened last year i was sitting in the garden to have a cig,  i see the odd shooting star satalite and lots of planes and helicopters. but i have also saw on 5 occations from then till now a weird white (a little bit to bright) light normal size for a regular plane but without the wing or tail lights. always flying from the sw to ne direction with no sound. there are biplanes here as we have an airshow every year. so i these could explain the strange lights. but what i saw tonight has left me stunned. i was sitting listening to my ipod and heard a weird fizzing and poping noise, i 1st thought it was my ipod but realized i could heard it in my left ear without the earphone in. i also felt a throbing hum in my stomach before it replaced the fizzing popping. which was coming from my right (sw). i looked up and to my right saw a glowing red/orange toadstool of molton lava, sprewing and dripping in all directions, the inside was dark and shaped like a cats eye (horizonal)but not black, but empty,is the only way i can discribe it. it seemed to moving like liquid and flew to the north, it looked about 5-6 hundred yards away doing 50mph ish. the seemed to be some sort of short thin cloud at a 45 degree angle 1 and ahalf its lengh, pointing to the ground. at this point nextdoors dog when crazy barking and yelping.It must have been about a minute of me watching its lazy flight it wobbled as it flew. all the time i felt and heard the hum. something snapped me out of it and probably nextdoor shouting at the dog. i wondered if i had enough time to run in for my camera, the thing was slowly arching to the nw. i ran and got my camera and draged the wife out but it had got to far away for my camera to pic up, and my wife didnt get a good look. sunderland, silksworth 10/04/10 10ish before match of the day
content.summary: Oval fireball over sunderland

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my daughter to my brothers house (she walks to school from there) and then on to work at about 5:30 in the morning.  i was driving east on 13th avenue, when i noticed a dark shape that was very low and just ahead of me at the corner.  at first, i thought it was a small plane and was it was going to crash into the school(elkhard elementary).  as i pulled over to the curb, i realized it was hovering, so it could not be a plane.  so then i thought, oh its a helicopter.  i was curious as to why (what i thought was a helicopter) was so low.  so i rolled down my window to get a better look and realized there were no lights on the object. i got scared when i also realized that it was totally silent.  helicopters are noisy.

the object was black in color and triagular shaped.  there were no lights and it didn't make a sound.  it was about 15 feet above the street.

as, i was leaving, the object started to drift upward and head northwest very slowly.  i saw it at the corner of thirteen avenue and dearborn street in aurora, colorado.

i have told a very few people what i saw, and i have never talked about it again.

when i first saw it i thought it was a small plane.  i really thought it was going to crash into the school so i stopped and pulled over to the curb.  when i noticed it was not moving, just hovering, that is when i thought it was a helicopter.  as i rolled down my window to get a better look is when i realized it did not make a sound and no lights.  i got very nervous and left.
content.summary: I saw a black triangle shape, about 15 feet above the street, not lights, no sounds.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my school playing basketball when it happened me and 2 other friends saw it because it was enormasly big and flashy , it was a green ball of light maybe the size of the sun it went away quikly i saw it appear into the sky and than disapear maybe 3 seconds later but it was moving quikly so i didnt have time to capture it on video. me and my friends were scared because it felt like it was plumiting into the earth
content.summary: Green ball of light size of the sun.

content.detailedDescription: Visiting vulture city mine, did not notice object when picture was taken.  after downloading, still can't determine what this is.
content.summary: Sun-dial like object

content.detailedDescription:
I was laying in bed looking out to the northwest sky and noticed a bright object in the sky.  it was glowing and then going completely dark.  it moved up and down and sideways.  i looked at it through my binoculars and saw that it changed shapes, appearing sparkly like diamonds with different colored lightning bolts running through it.  at one point it looked like a plate on it's side when it was moving sideways.  

i have previously seen similar type objects in the same direction of the sky.  it is always on clear, cold nights.
content.summary: An object in the northwest sky appeared brightly and then going dark and bright again.  i viewed it with a binocular as it changed shapes moving up and down and sideways.  it appeared like diamonds with lightning bolts running through it.

content.detailedDescription:
At sunset on wed. dec. 1 i noticed silvery objects in the sky as the sun was going down.  i did see an airplane with its contrail flying as it normally would with the trail becoming longer and eventually fading.  but these silvery streaks seemed to hover or move very, very slowly and no trail formed.  then a third silver object appeared but it was more of a dot/star-like than thin silvery thing.  no trail appeared with the third object either.  i watched for over a half hour.  for the longest time they seemed to hover but eventually i guess they were moving so slowly that i couldn't really detect movment but realized that they were moving in a northern (i think) direction.

it was about 5:15 pm when i first spotted the objects.  they were west/north west from me.  i think over hudson, port richey or maybe even the gulf of mexico 'cause i really couldn't tell exactly how far away the objects were.  i did film video and take pictures.  (but i'm not sure about loading a large video file with this report.  i can send to you if contacted for the footage.  i only included 2 pics with this report.)

i looked in the sky at the same time the following day and didn't see anything like the previous night.

i waited to submit this report because i recently submitted a previous report re: a thanksgiving night sighting and i didn't want to seem like i was reporting every damned thing i see in the sky around here.  but then i saw a report from someone else in the general area explaining something to similar to mine so i decided to submit.
content.summary: Silver dots and stationary "streak" like objects in sky

content.detailedDescription:
~12 bright orange starlike objects fairly evenly distributed in a 5 degree diameter circularish region, each slowly moving, but not all in the same direction or from the same radiant as a meteor, of closely similar brightness.  it produced the effect of a cloud of slowly diffusing particles of light.  i'm estimating each to be at about -4 to -5 magnitude, very bright.  some of them flickered very slightly.

the points were all bright when i first saw them, and over about 45 seconds, each one faded in turn until none were left.  the lights were ssw of my address [coordinates moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg] in north-central austin in the hyde park neighborhood, and at a very low (angular) altitude, perhaps 10-15 degrees, and visible through a gap in the trees. 

i have only a vague impression that they looked to be over austin downtown or at least ut, but only having magnitude and not really any clues from movement characteristics, it might have been farther (but i don't think closer).

my brother was leaving my house to go home, and we were standing on caswell ave. talking, and directly toward campus on that street in a gap between the trees (ssw).  i caught movement out of the corner of my eye and saw the lights.  my first quick impression was of a bunch of fireworks slowly dissipating as they normally do, but over a much longer period of time and definitely not falling from the sky.  nor did it seem to be like an exploding plane or helicopter because the lights were two uniform and very pointlike, and there was no residue in the sky of any explosion event.  it did not at all look like a meteorite fireball because of the slow lingering and very slow movement of each "star" in non-uniform directions.

i am an amateur astronomer and have seen a number of unusual atmospheric and optical phenomena, so i'm not an inexperienced observer.  my brother, also an experienced observer, was standing next to me and saw the same thing: our descriptions of the phenomenon were close to identical.

he and i were amazed and yelling, and ran into my house to get my wife (who has had multiple ufo experiences), while i ran down the street to get a better view through the trees were very marginally blocking the phenomenon.
content.summary: Approximately a dozen bright orange starlike objects

content.detailedDescription: At about 8:50 pm me and another person got into our hot tub. we had just layed back and were looking up at the stars when all of a suddon there was a very fast object in the sky. i pointed it out and asked the other person do you see that? it was moving very quickly we both sat up. it was in our sight for about 7-10 seconds. it was moving from north to south. the object was triangle shaped with the edges rounded. it reminded us of the movie the pretato be cause it appeared to be see through and i guess a better word for it was cloaked. however the very front of it had lights or was glowing. the glowing could have been because of the haze. there were light clouds in the area. we were outside for another hour in hopes of seeing it again. other then shooting stars we saw nothing. we have never seen anything like it until we ran into the house and started searching on the interet and saw a video of a cloaked booerang. it was very similar if not identical!!
content.summary: Very fast triangle-shaped boomerang-like object flying south toward colorado springs with cloaked glowing lights in front

content.detailedDescription:
July 22 2010 3:04 am 
i found this video file while clearing up memory in my camera in september.I dont remember filming this.Though i do rememeber filming somthing then deleting it and saying was just the reflection.Maybe it was this.I made sure it got deleted off my camera....So what ever this is,is not a reflection.

i have rewatched this again and again to make sure it is not reflection as you will see in the video.

at the start it stays in place even when i moved the camera as you can see. 
19 secs into filming it moves to the left out of view and only half is visble.
39 secs it filming it makes a droping motion going down and up and then when the bang sound happens it moves to the right.

1.At nights always at computer
2.I dont recall
3.Dont remember but must have been reflection or video would have been longer.
4.Looked a spinning fireball moving left and then moving down and up then moves right.
5.Dont remember
6.Dont remember
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo plazma/fireball

content.detailedDescription: At 5:45 pst i was sitting on my back porch and noticed what is known as a chemtrail and a light making weird blinks below it as it slowly was rising i decided to get my camera and film it after 2 min of film i decided to go back inside when 2 red lights come from the south toward the objects at super speed i turned back on the camera and was filmin and looking at the event with my regualr sight as the camera filmed. about 5 seconds after the 2 red lights aproached the object the bottom red light started flying toward me and went right over my house it was circle in shape with about 60-80 red lights in a circular motion on the bottom of the craft and made a 180 turn and headed back the way it came. i ran inside to see the video immediately and the film with the red lights had been erased but the film with the other light was still there and the pic. i was really irreated it was not there and looked at my cellphone and it had been turned off also. also when the craft went my i noticed a really odd smell almost bitter i have never smelled anything like it and it didnt last but about 10 seconds.
content.summary: Ufo hovering with 2 other ufos checking it out

content.detailedDescription: My fiancee and i went out to the garage to smoke a cigarette and when we sat down noticed a very bright light flashing in the distance. it looked like a very bright low star at 1st glance. it was very bright and flashing red, green, blue, yellow and orange. i am a novice astronomer and knew at once this was not a star, planet, comet or meteor or any thing i have ever seen flying in this area. it was totally quite and the night was very clear and we could hear no noise from the object. we could see that it was rotating fairly quickly. it seemed to be disk or round shaped. the colors it flashed were not steady or timed and in no pattern that we could make out. it hovered for 5 mins. and then suddenly moved away from us at an extremely high rate of speed. it disappeared to the east away from us and was gone. it had to be moving at several hundred miles an hour from a complete motionless hover. it seemed to be rather large and was about 1 to 2 miles from us. we both thought it was amazing and incredible. we were both excited and talked about it for awhile. during the sighting i was totally captivated by it but not scared just very curious. later that night i was a little scared about what we had seen and how close it was to our house.
content.summary: Object with bright flashing/pulsing multi color lights hovered then left and very high rate of speed.

content.detailedDescription: At first we thought it was a planet most likely venus.  it was very bright and pulsating red, white and blue.  at first it didn't move stayig where it was for at least 30 minutes, then it moved right slowly before taking off quickly into the distance and disappeared.
content.summary: It was pulsating red white and blue.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my car in the starbucks parking lot about 3 to about 3:20 pm when i noticed two little bright streak that remained unchanged for the few minutes i was there. i pointed it out to my daughter but she had difficulty seeing it because it was very sunny and bright. the object did not seem to move at all but had the same bright small streaks like what follows an airplane. it was just so strange that just stayed in one place. it seemed to be some distance away towards tampa. at first i thought it was an airplane which i've seen many times in our airspace but then it did not act like a plane in that it was still. i then had thoughts that it might be an unidentified object and i needed to let someone know so it could be checked out. i didn't have opportunity to take a photo and don't think my cell phone camera would have picked it up. i lost sight of it when i drove away assuming it was still there but unable to locate again as i drove along the road near there.
content.summary: Hanging in the distance over the trees behind starbucks

content.detailedDescription: Leaving my house going to the local drive-thru atm in my car, i immediately noticed a triangle of lights as i started my car. when i looked up it was right in front of me, over the cemetery across the street from the street i was parked on. the "plane" was moving away from me going slightly right but banking from the left, two steady white lights (a right white light diagonally higher than the left) and a blinking red light, not in line, between them. the three lights were about the size of a nickel at arms length in relative size. i live in south st. louis and commercial flights often fly through my airspace, most at lower levels, but few as low and in the direction this was going. though peculiar, i dismissed it as a plane. i then noticed a very bright white light peripherally to my right, a thick line a distance away and closer to the horizon. this object was at about 20 degrees and further away, the "plane" was closer and at about 40 degrees. i was parked at the end of my street and i pulled out and took a right, towards the white line light. it was now appearing to be the relative length of a thumbtack moving from my left to right, where it would cross in front of me in less than a half-minute if we both continued as we where. it then suddenly changed direction, now going perpendicular in direction to where it was going and the lighting "changed," but i attributed that to what i figured was the different orientation and direction the object was now traveling. it now appeared to have a distinct round larger white light in its front travel while coming in my direction, with a smaller round white light in the back, both steady, and a smaller blinking red light between them and slightly higher and closer to the front light of the "helicopter." i guessed this to be a helicopter for how very fast and sharply it changed direction, and figured i now saw the front headlight with a back white light at the back rotor and a red light at the main rotor. it was getting closer and and the white lights suddenly started dimming, the front light a lot and the back a little. it then suddenly sharply changed direction again and started moving relatively nw of my direction, now appearing in the same configuration as the "plane" i saw starting my car, two steady white lights with a blinking red light between them forming a short-height triangle of light in the direction each was traveling. just before i got to the atm i came to a clearer view from the trees and buildings of the relatively nw direction this object was slowly moving away in, seeming to slowly ascend also. i then suddenly saw a flash of white light to the bottom left of the object, the flash at about 15 degrees, the "helicopter" object about 30. i then could see the other object was another triangle of lights, seemingly further away in the distance, the relative size of an aspirin, and the lights were more faint for distance. i figured it was the first "plane" i'd seen as that was the direction it was heading in when i last saw it, but it had gotten to a lower relative height in the sky as it was flying away in a relatively nw direction and became obscured by the buildings and trees. when i got to the atm i could clearly see the two triangles when i looked to my right out the car window using the atm, lined up in a clearing left of a tree. at first they seemed to be almost one over the other at 15 and 30 degrees in height each. when next i looked, they were distinctly apart, diagonal from each other. when next i looked over, they were diagonally apart again, but had switched the sides they where on when i last looked! at that point i knew i was seeing unconventional craft for sure, nothing i'm aware of can move that distance across the sky in a perpendicular direction to their direction of travel, literally just in the moment of several seconds each time!! i left the atm and turned back my direction and didn't see them anymore, but it seemed that the "plane" ufo had also gone backwards when it last switched sides, where the "plane" object had become a larger relative size to the same size as the "helicopter" object!!!
content.summary: Two triangles move and change unconventionally over st. louis

content.detailedDescription:
On 2010 dec 03 about 930 pm while enjoying a back yard camp fire in thousand oaks california near the 23fwy at avenida de los flores we noticed a light in the eastern sky which appeared to be the same color and brightness as a yellowish fog street light. it was flying toward us (west ward) it then zig-zagged then flew straight again, then zig-zagged again. it almost appeared to be a flame fired toy balloon but it was too bright 
and with the speed and the sudden turns any flame would have been extinguished. it made no noise at all and in about 2 minutes it suddenly gained altitude faded to a red dot then vanished. i live under the flight path to lax and this light flew across the flight path around or just below the altitude the jumbo jets fly. the clouds were moving slowly, there was very little wind and there were no aircraft seen in the area. using google earth and measuring from the mountain it appeared to fly over it seemed
to travel about 5.5 miles in about the 2 minutes we observed it.  i think it could have been what is known as an earthquake light. there were power lines under the center of it's path but it was very high in comparison to the lines. if it was a flame fired toy balloon the person who set it aloft could have started a brush fire.
content.summary: Fireball like ufo seen zigzagging flying straight then zigzagging again

content.detailedDescription:
In 1991 myself and 2 friends were standing outside of my house at around 9 p.M. directly in front of my home is a street that goes around to make a circle and come back out further down but still onto my street again and at the entrance in front of my home is a streetlight.
as i and my friends were talking away i noticed over my home a massive black cylinder shaped something moving very slow over my home, i was only able to make it out because it was darker than the sky behind it,there were no lights on it, no sound of an engine but because it was probably only 250-300 ft. above us i could hear the sound of the wind pushing off of its rounded end.To give it an est. speed i would say it was around 15 mph. as it passed above the streetlight in front of my home (at this point we were in the street watching it amazed) i saw what i interpreted to be the glint of light off of a metal surface.
my friends and i tried to keep following it but it was on a path that was leading away and over the homes in the middle of the circle street and when we got to where we thought it would emerge it never showed again.
we did not report this.
the size of this thing i would est. to be as long and as wide and half again(maybe more) as a city bus, rounded on both ends like a tube, not like a submarine or anything exaggerated like that. it was very unremarkable in the way of ufos i guess but it sure made an impact on me.
content.summary: An unknown black something flew over my home

content.detailedDescription:
There are about 10 flying in 5 groups, so two in each group. sometimes, one followed another and sometimes they were split apart, but most the time they flew in parallel formation. 

this case is one of my long term visitation, more details from: [link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Photos of one alien species?

content.detailedDescription:
Every evening i step outside to have a cigarette. i keep a pair of binoculars at the garage door so i can check out the moon, stars and any aircraft flying over. last night about 7:30 i went out the side door of my garage and lit a cigarette. i was facing southwest. i noticed blinking lights moving away from me at high altitude. i grabbed my binoculars to have a look. looking at about a 45 degree angle i had had what i believe is venus in my view. as i looked at the planet, what appeared to be 3 stars in unison forming a triangle moved through my field of view very quickly! i did not have the aircraft in my view at the time. i pulled the binoculars away to look with my eyes, i didn't see it. i again looked with the binoculars, scanning the sky in the direction of the movement, i saw nothing. 
in the brief time the object was in my view i could not make out any edges or shape other than the 3 lights formed a triangle. i got excited about what i had seen and went back in the house to tell my wife. she wasn't as excited... :) the only things i can think to add is that the sky was clear and the object had to be very large if it was one object, also there was no noise.
content.summary: 3 lights as stars in the form of a triangle

content.detailedDescription:
Look up now! ; this report is what i saw 30 min ago.
it bobbed up and down as it went over ; maybe 1000 ft up 
first appeared to be a star then i grabbed binocs and as it came closer it clearly appeared to be a white ballon then as it was about to go out of my view over some trees , it moved bak to a clear view location again; so i sent my wife to get the camera. it then quickly bobbled around morphed into 4 baloon looking objects together, one was red; one appeared to be a bright light on front. this thing moved about 4 mph.Stopped moved back maybe 1000 ft in a second. that was it ; i was so excited i didn't think about a camera until it was  too late. spring branch, anyone else see it?
content.summary: Star morphing to white  balloon then to 4 baloons ,turned red w/ light in front; id. to nyc  sighting

content.detailedDescription:
At about 10:55 pm ct on december 1, 2010 while driving up the lane to my rural home in central illinois, i saw a very bright round orange light to the north, but upon getting closer to the house i could not see the location of where it had been due to trees. in taking out the dogs from the house just moments later, though, i felt nervously compelled to take the camera out with me. as soon as i got outside, i saw an object which had an easily discernable dark triangle shape, but seemed somewhat rounded in the back. it had 3 solid bight white lights on the back, with a red blinking light on each side of these 3 lights, and seemed to have a dull solid white light on the front point. it came from the north, traveling south/southwest, and was at a height much lower than the average commercial aircraft, certainly less than 5,000 feet. i could not tell its true size, but a nickel at arm���s length would have easily covered it. it seemed to move a little slower compared to the usual aircraft sighted in the area, and may have emitted a faint rumbling sound, but i���m not sure.   the path of this object was nearly identical to a triangle object which i saw on august 9, 2007 and reported earlier this year. the sky was very dark and completely clear of any cloud cover. it should be noted that all commercial flights in this area travel from either east to west or west to east, at a much higher altitude, and do not have the pattern of lights that i saw on this object. duration of the sighting was less than 30 seconds before it just seemed to fade away, perhaps due to distance.
 
i took 5 pictures with a new sony cybershot 14.1 mega pixels camera. the first one picture, numbered 00441 on the camera, shows the object's lights, although the image is small. the odd thing is that this first picture, #00441, did not download from the camera to the computer, even though i downloaded all of the camera���s images three times. the other 4 shots did download and all were just black. the first picture is still viewable in the camera.  the only other time that this camera and its download malfunctioned at all was in a sighting report i made of an orange light which occurred on september 23, 2010.
content.summary: Dark triangle with lights, photo download failure

content.detailedDescription:
a topoleuv aircraft was passing towards the final approach. suddenly a bright disk as huge as 5 stadiums enterred the sphere brightly. after 2 seconds turned left in a 90 degrees l shape flightwith dark fuselage,as if to evade the withnessees asap. no sound effect was heared. the giant ufo disappeared immediately fading out in 2 seconds. i am sure the gufo was in an ultimately top-secret mission from another galaxy.
    i, as an ufologist could not be allowed to have a closer contact with the crews of the g-ufo.
    the topoleuv aircraft's crew could not perceive the upper event at all.
    there were no trace remained from the gufo's path.
    that was an incident to warn me to be away from any celestial demands from human beings for my inventions and so on.
    i am sorry to have lost the contacts later on i had with the smaller ufos.
    have ultra-nice times.
    with best regards and best wishes.
content.summary: Beyond the van-allain orb, enterredbrightlyinto  the sphere, then turned 90 degrees left with dark values.

content.detailedDescription: This was on a warm summers night in the city of bristol, virginia. my uncle and i were sitting on a picnic table at my grandmothers house. her property sits on a bank that overlooks the city street about 15 to 20 feet below. the picnic table was about 20 feet from the street. all of a sudden out of nowhere we saw this ball come up the street and stopped at eye level and was center of the street right in front of us. it moved back and forward about three times, spinning the whole time and then shot off at a high rate of speed, went about 200 yards and shot to the right over a patch of wooded area and was gone. i asked him if we should call the police or someone and he said."what are we gonna tell them". people will think we are crazy. so we never mentioned it. a couple of weeks ago a was talking to a couple of young guys and asked if they believed in ufo's. they looked at each other in surprise and described a similiar sighting between bristol, virginia and abingdon, virgina a few day earlier. i just wondered if anything like this has ever been reported. again, the ball was spinning very fast and traveled at a high rate of speed when it took off. no sound at all.Thank you, [name edited from narrative/cms/tg]
content.summary: Glowing and spinning, size of a softball or a little bigger

content.detailedDescription: Matillija canyon rd. in ojai calif.Ive been seeing orbs ufos and now the aliens are to the form of brush.The perpose is to mine the earth.Like cattle grases on grass. these entatees it looks like they hover over the earth. but then i saw one up close. it look like it had thousand of legs under its body.That explanes how it moves over the earth.Ive also seen them on strate up and down cliffs, and what it looks like before and after they pass.Looks like a inch or so have been taken away so you can see were they been. ive seen empty ships on the side of a tall steep mountain then i go back to that spot a little wile latter and see a row of about 30 brush wateing to borde the ship. over all it takes about a hole day. dec. 1 to 3 all ive seen is a lot of ships loading its cargo.Last night was great dec 3 there was so much like negative energy all over one part of the canyon i saw way to much look like giant black birds flying all over like they were all krazy, some how about 3 or 4 in the morining a realy big dark cloud in a long toub.One end skimmed over about 8 mountian tops. each one at a time,and whenit tough it was like looking at fire works you can see about 200 dark ufo leave the ground into the cloud. this morining it felt like there was no negativaty anywere. but i notice with all that brush gone you can see a lot more soil please let me know when mufon can come out to invessigate one more thing this mountian is right above the hot  spring.There are marking and a hole city on the side of the nountian. as soon as i notic the plase were they live. right befor my eyes it starts th fold down to were it looks like there is nothing there so pleasa come to ojai valley and bring all who knows in this matter. also i know about 10 to 15 plases were they are thank you  for takeing the time. [name edited from narrative/cms/tg]
content.summary: It is not about the ships its about what they leave behind. they mimic brush and rock formation and there ships are camofladge to fit in to its seroundings

content.detailedDescription: On july 24th i met my friend [friends name removed cms/dr] at moabi park to go fishing. we launched the boat & was about a 1/2 mile past the bridge on interstate 40 when i looked up & saw a big light comming down at about a 90 degree angle & i yelled at  [friends name removed cms/dr],"look" & we watched it come down at a very fast speed & the light was about 1000 feet from the ground it faded in color & disappeared from sight.The light came down right over interstate 40. this was only about 1/2 mile away from us, very clear to us.  [friends name removed cms/dr] said what was that! i said that was a ufo because we don't have anything like that.This all happened in about 15 second. there was traffic on interstate 40 so i presume somebody else saw it to, they would have to be going west tho.
content.summary: Very bright light  comming out of sky toward the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
On sept. 1996 . me and my friends, a couple of hundred people plus the local police plus army forces witnessed an amazing ufo. 
i have been carrying this story for years now and always wanted to post it on ats but was too lazy to type it. two hours ago i found by mere chance a report describing my exact incident and that made it easier to share this story without feelings like a total fruitcake.

i`ll get straight to the point. 

i am a 34 yrs. israeli business men who currently lives in tel ���aviv.
(my army training involved recognizing, spotting and targeting 
aerial objects ���mainly russian made ��� for the intelligence core).  
i am telling it to you exactly as i saw it, and no i do not make this up ��� so excuse me that it came out so loooong:
at about 2 a.M. on tuesday, september 17, 1996 i was driving back from visiting friends in tel-aviv, driving on the main northern exit from the city. 
a few k"m up the road i came to a big intersection called "ramat-aviv junction"
as i approached the junction i realized that something is not quite right with what i was starting to see. all across the x junction, were parked cars, scattered right between the traffic lights , facing in all directions (opposite to driving direction , on the curbs , on the pedestrian zone etc.). 
my first reaction was "oh a trance music party just popped!" (those were quite common back then in israel ). i drove slowly to center of the junction and then i noticed that the street is full with people of all colors and ages looking upwards in total silence. (that was very eerie).
at that time i had a volvo model 960t with a sun roof so i just sat and looked up through it . what i saw is still fresh in my memory after all those years.
about a 150 meters east of the junction there are bunch of residential buildings (about 15 story high). 
in front of one of the buildings about the 14 th floor hovered something which looked like a bright star as big a little truck.
the best way to describe it is ��� a bright star ��� which is moving in a frenzy 
to almost all directions at once, changing hundreds of colors in a millisecond (from blue to green to orange to even what seemed like gold and silver).
the object was clearly in front of the building, and while emitting "rays" of light all over it did not project on the building behind it . 
the object was "making a show" for us ���moving up and down like a crazy firefly. i could not take my eyes of it . and nor could i make a sound .
suddenly in a blink of an eye, the object "leaped" about 50 meters upwards and vanished behind the building only to re-appear a second later pointing further to the east. 
as soon as the object got further away from us ��� many people jumped in their cars and shouted "lets chase him!" , and drove madly after his flight course further to the east .
i geared my car and  said to myself i gotta get my friends to see this  or they would never believe me. i drove in ridicules speed about 9 k"m to the north  to my friend's house, grabbed them out of their beds and hurled them to the car,  we drove 
back to "ramat aviv" junction, two ladies were still standing there, we asked them bluntly "which way the ufo went?" and they pointed east. 
we turned east and drove another 2.5 k"m until we reached one of the bridges that are crossing the "ayalon highway". (kakal bridge),
the bridge ( a 3 lane from each side type) was already full of people , border police , light army units, and even tv crews! 
the crowd faced north, we dumped the car on the sideway and run to the ledge of the bridge , and looked north as well.
we saw the "bright star" hanging about 60 meters above the traffic, as if it was a lamp hanging from a ceiling. this time it was bigger, it didn���t change color, and was just hovering silently. this continued for a few minutes.
i stood about 20 meters from an army jeep and i saw the border police soldiers (about 6 of them) pointing their guns towards the object.
then i heard the officer say to one of the corporals "tell them not to do anything (with the guns) ..".
an nco that stood by said: "what are you trying to do? start the war of the worlds?" (it was not a women like the below report say).
a few minutes later the object suddenly sprinted up and away like that fastest rocket i have ever seen. until it became a bright red star. 
me and my friends hanged around for a couple of cigarettes, looking up , than the red star made a sharp right turn and vanished.
the next day the main newspapers covered it and the headlines said:
" a ufo in tel aviv`s sky " and described about 15% of what really occurred .
the chief of police said it was " a kite that had a stick light attached to it���or probably a children`s hoax"
 (yeah right, during my army service i could spot the rear light of a bell206 a cobra or a mig27 from miles away with no night goggles ���.I am pretty sure this wasn���t a kite.).
this was a very public sighting and a very direct ufo encounter-but strangely enough ��� it almost has no records on the net.
the only difference is that i saw it with my own eyes .
p\s
i wasn`t aware of the ufo subject at all at that time !
.
this is the report i found on the net today:
hovering ufo causes traffic jam in tel aviv
at 2 a.M. on tuesday, september 17, 1996, traffic on high road in the ramat aviv section of tel aviv, israel came to a sudden stop as motorists abandoned their cars to watch a hovering ufo. tel aviv police received dozens of calls about a "light-emitting ufo" doing aerial loops over the northern end of the city. according to the daily newspaper ma'ariv, police spokesman gadi doron said officers reported seeing "a strange light in the night sky," along with hundreds of motorists at the scene.
as the onlookers watched, a soldier of the border police offered to shoot at the object. other members of the crowd disagreed vehemently. one woman said, "what are you trying to do? start an interstellar war?"
about an hour before dawn, the ufo stopped "doing tricks" and headed east, parallel to the avenue shaul hamelech. enthusiastic motorists attempted to follow in their cars. then the ufo reversed direction, flew back to ramat aviv and gradually disappeared.
in their story, the newspaper ma'ariv listed 16 recent ufo incidents in israel.
content.summary: A ufo i saw together with hundreds of people in 1996

content.detailedDescription: I had went outside on my back deck to bring in some flashlight batteries that i had put out to let the sun recharge.( to the people that don't know that trick,the sun will recharge them if they aren't totally dead.) as i was getting the batteries i saw a very shiny craft(looked to be v shaped) moving very slow. i stood there looking in amazement a the thing for about two minutes. it was bigger than a 747 jumbo jet. it had no noise. it was about 1000 to 1500 feet high in the sky. probably about 3/4 to a mile east of us. there were no clouds at the time. i went into the house to tell my wife that she had to come out and see what i was seeing. we both went back out and the craft had moved just a little ways in the sky. she watched it with me for another 2 minuets and i said i was going in to get my binoculars to get a better look. when i came back out i focused on it for just a second when my wife and i heard a jet coming fairly low from behind us. we both turned around to see the jet. a popular tree blocked our view. we then turned back around and the craft was gone. their was plenty of sky for us to have seen it after we had turned back around.It was so shiny it looked like highly polished chrome or silver. i spotted night time ufo's several times this year, but this is my first daytime experience.I don't have any pictures because my camera wasn't working. one thing else, it was so quite you could here a pin drop.( no birds, dogs, anything.
content.summary: Very shinny craft moving very slow

content.detailedDescription:
A stationary light suddenly darts. makes a right angle turn and shoots downward seemingly into the gulf of mexico. on vacation in florida,i was sitting on a deck overlooking the beach. stargazing when what i thought was a bright star at approx. 45 degrees to the horizon (such as venus)darted to the right (north)then straight downward seemingly into the gulf of mexico.

 i was trying to rationalize this as a flare or meteorite. but, could not explain away the right angle maneuver....

 then, to make things more bizarre.... my 17 yr. old son observed the same scenario two nights later on nov. 30th only a few degrees south
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Stationary light suddenly darts. makes a right angle turn and shoots downward.

content.detailedDescription:
My parents are out of town for the week so they asked me to house sit for them, so i headed up to their house in the mountains with my dog (extremely smart australian shepard) after work at around 10:00 pm. at 11:30 i went into the kitchen to make something to eat and as i was washing my hands at the sink i saw 2 flashes of blue light through the sliding glass door in the back yard out of the corner of my eye. i didnt think much of it and went over to the stove. so now im facing the sliding glass window and as i look up i see another flash except this time its in my direct vision and my dog sees it too, perks her ears up and starts growling. as i stand there, kind of in shock, i see 2 more flashes all within 15-20 seconds of each other. so as my dog and i are standing there staring out the into the darkness, after what felt like maybe a minute after seeing the lights, both my dog and i hear a loud bang come from one of the bedrooms upstairs. i immediately call 911 and head straight into my mom and dads room to grab a gun. dispatch tells me to stay in the room and hide somewhere to wait for the police to arrive and not even 30 seconds later i hear the police cars pull into the driveway so i put the gun away and crawl out the window to meet them (yes i grabbed my dog too). the officers searched the house and the surrounding area for a good 20 minutes and find nothing. here's where it gets weird, as im telling one of the officers about the lights 2 other officers, who were standing over at thier car talking to each other, immediatley walk over to me and start asking me questions about them, what did they look like, what color were they, what shape were they, ect... so i ask the officers why they're so interested and they tell me that they have had numerous calls throughout the past year regarding the exact same thing, and apparently another officer (who wasnt there) had seen them recently too.
now keep in mind that this area is in the denver metro foothills where every house sits on about and acre of land and in my parents case, the nearest house is over a mile away and the back yard is litteraly a forest. 
but its now 1:05 am as im writing this and i havent heard or seen a single thing since the police arrived about an hour ago. 

what i thought the lights were at first, was that it was a flashlight from someone trespassing, then once i heard the bang i thought for sure that they had broken in. only when i saw that look on the officers face when i was describing it did i realize this was something else. thinking back to it now it doesnt make any sense that it would be a flashlight because when the flashes would occur it had no motion, the light was solid. the lights would just shine in place for a second or two, then go away. and the bang sound, i really dont know how to describe. it was as if someone dropped a heavy box or something in one of the bedrooms, and to be honest im still to affraid to go in there and see if anything is out of place. 
i dont know why i even got on here and wrote this, i just remembered seeing this organization on 9news a long time ago and thought that this might interest you. anyways, that was my experience tonight.
content.summary: 5 blue balls of light flash in back yard followed by something inside the house
